title: Hack my account
body:
Someone hacked my account and sent a link to all my  friends and accept all my friend requests.

the massage:
---Event 750 Rp And One Skin Omega Squad Now

replies.body: I've removed the link for security reasons.  Don't worry, though, we can help out with this.  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help make sure the account is safe in your hands.  In the meantime, run through the[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide as well to secure as much of your info as you can.  We'll see you there!
